attributes.action: Reject any petition for another EU Referendum in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: When will it end if another referendum is granted ?  Would we say best of 3 if remain win by a slight majority ?  It cannot happen !
attributes.background: The UK had plenty of time to understand there was a referendum to leave or remain in the EU.  The vote was cast and leave was the decision. Now people are trying to get another referendum arranged.  We say no.  Democracy has been done and a re vote would send a terrible message to the people.
